channel.title: Maths on @qrui - interetro.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Maths on @qrui - interetro.xyz

item.title: Circular Permutation
item.description: A colleague had a coding interview for Huawei last Sunday. I heard the second question was quite “mathematical”. Let me rephrase it here a little bit.

item.title: What does Top-Rated Mean in Reddit’s Ranking System
item.description: Though Reddit’s comment sorting system has been in use for almost a decade, the fact is that I wasn’t so exposed to western internet community till 2013, it is still, a rather new thing to me.

item.title: Drawing Trajectory of Peter de Jong Attractors with ggplot2
item.description: The design was inspired by a blog on Fronkonstin: Experiments in R. I modified the code a little bit, so that the output is generated by Peter de Jong Attractors instead of Clifford Attractors.
